comment_Bot_Name: Bot Name will be replaced with Character Card name if enabled.
comment_Character_Card: Character cards go in the 'Characters' folder.  Using a character will replace the botname.  RAG chatbot will not use a character card.
comment_TTS: The available TTS methods are: gTTS, coquiaiTTS - NOT IMPLEMENTED YET
comment_Model_Backend: The available Model Backends are available in the Model_Formats folder.
comment_API: The available API's are: Oobabooga, KoboldCpp, AetherNode, OpenAi
comment_Write_To_Dataset: Options are Disabled, Manual, Auto. Choose Disabled if using GUI.
comment_Dataset_Format: Must be the name of a json in ./Model_Formats
